name: Landscape Revelations
description:
Genesis artwork
It is a work made with smoke, soot and varnish on the surface of a glass, to later be recorded and digitally intervened.
Represents the reunion with nature, childhood and wild thinking. Reflections of the natural environments lived and resignified. The links between superstition, the observed and the experiences that appear as reconstructed horizons.
Made by Pablo Butteri and Gaston Poirier
